dcterms:creator: Richard Sproat
Alan W. Black
Stanley F. Chen
Shankar Kumar
Mari Ostendorf
Christopher D. Richards
dcterms:description: A manually annotated dataset containing 5819 sentences extracted from Vietnamese news articles, used for detecting non-standard words in text.
dcterms:title: Manually annotated dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 5819 labeled sentences created by the authors for the purpose of detecting non-standard words.
dcterms:title: Dataset consisting of 5819 labeled sentences

dcterms:description: A dataset of contact names created by the authors for the purpose of normalizing contact names in text.
dcterms:title: Contact names dataset

dcterms:description: A lexicon collected from Vietnamese name databases, Vietnamese wordlists, and Underthesea dictionaries for the purpose of normalizing non-standard words.
dcterms:title: Lexicon collected from Vietnamese name databases, Vietnamese wordlists, and Underthesea dictionaries
